name: Ghost Mansion II
overview: You are Kra, the fearless adventurer who has decided to risk all in an assault on Ghost Mansion. Inside are many, many diamonds guarded by a host of ghosts, spiders, snakes and other loathesome creatures. Beware of traps and evil magic! Each room have their unique dangers. Complete all 5 levels of Forbidden Castle by collecting all the diamonds. Passage to next screen given after all diamonds are collected from the current screen.
